Reviews.Title: Worked great for 6 hours
Reviews.Author: NTMD8OR
Reviews.Content: Received the item yesterday. Unpacked it, installed one of the 2 batteries and turned it on. It asked to insert sim so I put my T-mobile sim card in it and it powered up and worked fine. paired with my Plantronics Voyager Pro bluetooth headset and worked well. I inserted a micro sd card and it recognized it quickly but when I took it out the bezel around the face of the watch and the power button fell off. I did get them back on but still it was not very secure. I then charged both batteries and and wen to bed.I decided to wear it today while I helped a friend move. After about 6 hours, I looked to check the time and the screen was blank. I though the battery had died so, when I got home I installed the spare battery. Still would not power up. The bezel did not fall off today, until I changed the battery then I had to put it on again.I have contacted Amazon about return and am waiting for reply, but one thing has me rather puzzled. In the listing, it says that the item is sold by PGD Group and Fulfilled By Amazon. Which means that Amazon is supposed to handle customer service for FBA orders. However, when I visited the returns page for the item I saw this notice."This order was sold and shipped by an Amazon SellerUpon completing this page, the details of this return will be sent to the seller for approval. If the return is automatically approved, your return label will be available right away. Otherwise, we'll need to wait for the seller to review this return request and provide a label or instructions on how to return your items."Now I am curious as to how this will affect my return and refund.I will update this when the process is complete.

Reviews.Title: The watch is OK
Reviews.Author: james wilborn
Reviews.Content: The additional battery that was included never took a charge. The watch also will turn off for no reason from time to time even with a full charge or in mid conversation.However when it's working properly ist's fine.James W.

Reviews.Title: Was fun while it lasted
Reviews.Author: Wade Sunderland
Reviews.Content: Was great while it lasted.... for my son that was only three days! Not near heavy duty enough for wearing it on your wrist.

Reviews.Title: This Watch is Ok!!
Reviews.Author: Octavio
Reviews.Content: It works like a charm, has earphones, which I have you use because of my poor hearing, it paired great with my Motorola hands free and got playing Mp3 with 2gb card(not included) it has everything you need. I just plugged in my sim card and dialed. What I would have a complaint is on what they charged me for the shipping , so watch out for this matter before buying ,I simply confused the shipping thinking that it was a total plus another item I sent for. The watch is good and has a lot of features for something so small, no body has that item here so I will be the first to show it off!!
